title: Unraveling and regulating superstructure domain dispersion in lithium-rich layered oxide cathodes for high stability and reversibility
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00487F, Paper
Geunho Choi, Uijin Chang, Jeongjae Lee, Kwanghee Park, Hyuksang Kwon, Hyosung Lee, Yongil Kim, Jong Hyeok Seo, Yoon-Cheol Park, Inchul Park, Jieun Kim, Seungmi Lee, Jinuk Choi, Byongyong Yu, Jun-Hyuk Song, Hosun Shin, Seung-Wook Baek, Sung Keun Lee, Hyeokjun Park, Keeyoung Jung
Lithium-rich layered oxides (LLOs) have attracted tremendous attention as promising high-energy cathode materials thanks to their superb capacity through additional anionic oxygen redox. The unique cationic superstructure ordering in the...
